name: .ZPAQ
summary: Learn about .ZPAQ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a ZPAQ file with several file decompression programs, including ZPAQ (multiplatform) and ConeXware PowerArchiver (multiplatform). For example, to open a ZPAQ file with PowerArchiver, select File â†’ Open Archive.
Various compression utilities, such as ConeXware PowerArchiver and ZPAQ, can convert ZPAQ archives by extracting their items and then compressing them in a different archive format.
For example, the Windows version of PowerArchiver can extract the contents of a ZPAQ file, then compress them as various archive types, including the following formats:
